text:
Abstract Algebra | What is a ring?

\begin{aligned}\n&a+0=a\\\n&\begin{array}{l}\na+(-a)=0 \\\na+b=b+a \\\n(a b) c=a(b c) \\\na(b+c)=a b+a c\n\end{array}\\\n&(a+b) c=a c+b c\\\n&c\n\end{aligned}[imath]a+(-a)=0 [/imath] [imath]a+b=b+a [/imath] [imath](a b) c=a(b c) [/imath] [imath]a(b+c)=a b+a c[/imath]
